author: Staff Reporter
text: More than 300 members of the Indian National League were arrested when they tried to take out a rally and conduct ‘Tyagis’ conference’ without police permission here on Thursday. The INL members congregated at Begampur to take out a rally demanding release of Muslims languishing in jails for the past 19 years. The police had refused permission for the rally and conference in the city. A posse of police personnel were deployed at Begampur.
title: INL men arrested
